page.title: 09THE MILL INN.
page.content:
THE MILL INN IS SITUATED ON THE BANKS OF THE RIVER MORDA IN THE CANDY AREA. IT WAS OPENED IN 1982 AND IS CALLED 'THE MILL INN' BECAUSE IT OCCUPIES THE SITE OF AN OLD CORN MILL.
OPENING HOURS: 11.00 TO 15.00 HRS AND 18.00 TO 01.00 HRS.
FACILITIES: TWO POOL TABLES, DART BOARD, FRUIT MACHINE, JUKE BOX.
ENTERTAINMENT: THERE IS ENTERTAINMENT EVERY NIGHT INCLUDING 'LIVE' GROUPS AND DISCOS. COUNTRY AND WESTERN GROUPS ARE THE MOST POPULAR.
AVERAGE PATRONAGE: MONDAYS AND TUESDAYS = 20 TO 30; WEDNESDAYS AND THURSDAYS = 40 TO 50; WEEKENDS = 100.
